org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov

Interface QuoteRelated<C extends Costed>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - The related entity.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCostedResource, ProvQuoteInstanceResource, ProvQuoteStorageResource, ProvResource

    public interface QuoteRelated<C extends Costed>
    An object related to a quote. Handle cost cost and association validation against the quote.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double HOURS_BY_MONTH
      Average hours in one month.

    • Method Detail

      • getSubscriptionResource

        org.ligoj.app.resource.subscription.SubscriptionResource getSubscriptionResource()
        Return the SubscriptionResource instance. Used to resolve the related subscription and validate the visibility.
        Returns:
        The SubscriptionResource instance.

      • getRepository

        ProvQuoteRepository getRepository()
        Return the ProvQuoteRepository instance. Used to resolve the right quote.
        Returns:
        The ProvQuoteRepository instance.

      • getQuoteFromSubscription

        default ProvQuote getQuoteFromSubscription(int subscription)
        Return the quote associated to the given subscription. The visibility is checked.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The linked subscription.
        Returns:
        The quote if the visibility has been checked.

      • newUpdateCost

        default <T extends Costed> UpdatedCost newUpdateCost(org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.dao.RestRepository<T,java.lang.Integer> repository,
                                                     T entity,
                                                     java.util.function.Function<T,FloatingCost> costUpdater)
        Request a cost update of the given entity and report the delta to the the global cost. The changes are persisted.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type holding the cost.
        Parameters:
        repository - The repository of the entity holding the cost.
        entity - The entity holding the cost.
        costUpdater - The function used to compute the new cost.
        Returns:
        The new computed cost.

      • addCost

        default <T extends Costed> FloatingCost addCost(T entity,
                                                java.util.function.Function<T,FloatingCost> costUpdater)
        Add a cost to the quote related to given resource entity. The global cost is not deeply computed, only delta is applied.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type holding the cost.
        Parameters:
        entity - The configured entity, related to a quote.
        costUpdater - The function used to compute the new cost.
        Returns:
        The new computed cost.

      • addCost

        default FloatingCost addCost(ProvQuote entity,
                             FloatingCost fc)
        Update the quote's cost minimal and maximal values.
        Parameters:
        entity - The quote entity.
        fc - The cost to add. May be a negative value.
        Returns:
        The formal fc parameter.

      • round

        default double round(double value)
        Round a cost to eliminate floating point artifact, and without required BigDecimal usage (not yet)
        Parameters:
        value - The value to round.
        Returns:
        The rounded value with 4 decimals.

      • toMonthly

        default double toMonthly(double value)
        Compute the monthly cost from hourly costs.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to round.
        Returns:
        The rounded value for one month with 4 decimals.

      • toMonthly

        default double toMonthly(double value,
                         int mult)
        Compute the monthly cost from hourly costs.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to round.
        mult - The multiplier before the round.
        Returns:
        The rounded value for one month with 4 decimals.

      • updateCost

        default <T extends AbstractQuoteResource> FloatingCost updateCost(T qr,
                                                                  java.util.function.Function<T,FloatingCost> costProvider,
                                                                  java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> toMonthly)
        Update the actual monthly cost of given resource.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The entity type holding the cost.
        Parameters:
        qr - The AbstractQuoteResource to update cost.
        costProvider - The cost provider.
        toMonthly - The function to use to compute the monthly cost from the hourly one.
        Returns:
        The new (min/max) cost.

      • toFloatingCost

        Extract the costs from a quote and build a new FloatingCost
        Parameters:

        Returns:
